Package org.codemonkey.javareflection

Class Summary
ExternalClassLoader A toolkit that can read and compile .java sourcefiles on the fly in runtime.
FieldUtils A Field shorthand utility class mainly used to collect fields from classes meeting certain restrictions/requirements.
FieldWrapper A wrapper class that keeps the property and its setter/getter in one place.
JReflect This class utilizes the functionality of the Java class java.lang.reflect.
ValueConverter This reflection utility class predicts (and converts) which types a specified value can be converted into.
 

Enum Summary
FieldUtils.BeanRestriction Indicates whether a field needs a Bean setter or getter, exactly none or any combination thereof.
FieldUtils.Visibility Determines what visibility modifiers a field is allowed to have in FieldUtils.collectFields(Class, Class, EnumSet, EnumSet).
JReflect.LookupMode Defines to allowed lookup modes for matching Java methods and constructors.
 

Exception Summary
ExternalClassLoader.CompileException Parameterized exception used when Java's runtime compiler fails to compile a Java source file.
ValueConverter.IncompatibleTypeException This exception can be thrown in any of the conversion methods of ValueConverter, to indicate a value could not be converted into the target datatype.
